snippet.title: DELIVER US THE MOON: 50 Years in The Making
snippet.description:
Add to your Steam Wishlist now!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/428660/Deliver_Us_The_Moon/

Launching later this year on Steam, PlayStation 4 and the Xbox One, the team wanted to celebrate the heroic mission of the men and women who took part in Apollo 11’s journey to the Moon.  
Inspired by their Grandpa’s stories the developers set about creating something that captured everything they used to dream about.

Set 100 years after the first human-made object reached the surface of the Moon, Deliver us the Moon even pays homage to the original moon landing, with the original moon lander and US flag recreated for players to visit!
